oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Group of recovered relics from Sequatchie County, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This group of dug relics includes grape shot, minie balls, Smith carbine bullet, a Confederate Gardner bullet, Sharps, Burnside, and Spencer bullets and pistol rounds. Also exhibited are casings from Burnside and Spencer cartridges, a sword belt hook, US eagle belt plate, US eagle buttons, US knapsack hooks, US four hole buttons, melted lead, and Confederate and civilian buttons, and a portion of a Confederate rectangular "CSA" pewter belt plate.
